"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder kenntnis? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent or knowledge? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without proper consent or transparency. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics. the use of german language and hashtags targeting a german-speaking audience also helps to localize the issue and make it more relatable to the intended audience.
